alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Red River (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:35AM CDT until June 18 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Bowie County in northeastern Texas... Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 335 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pattonville, or 13 miles west of Clarksville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Boxelder, De Kalb, Bogata, Bagwell, Dalby Springs, Detroit, Deport, Avery, Annona, Almont, Beaverdams, Harts Bluff, Lydia, Negley, Cuthand, English and Johntown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
